plot: With the Hong Kong film industry suffering a downturn, this series looks at what independent producers are doing to revitalize the local industry.
plot_en: With the Hong Kong film industry suffering a downturn, this series looks at what independent producers are doing to revitalize the local industry.

title: Sau jok ying wa
